title: Step Six
subtitle: We were entirely ready to have God remove all these defects of character.

questions.prompt: Which of my defects cause the most harm to myself and to others?
What specific examples show how these defects have harmed me and others?
How have my character defects isolated me from other people?
How have my defects affected my relationship with a Higher Power?
Am I willing to have all of my defects of character removed?
Do I believe that some of my character defects are good qualities that have just been distorted? Which ones?
How does my understanding of God's nature affect my willingness to have these defects removed?
Am I willing to have a defect removed even if I can't see what good quality exists underneath? Why or why not?
Do I think my defects serve a purpose? What purpose?
Do I believe my defects are connected to my survival? How?
In what ways do I fear I'll be vulnerable if my defects are removed?
What do I fear will happen to me if I let go of the familiar?
What must I do to open myself to changing?
How long am I willing to suffer the consequences of my character defects before I'm ready to let them go?
What does it mean to me to have God remove my defects?
Do I believe that my Higher Power can remove my defects? Why or why not?
Am I willing to change? What does that mean to me?
Do I believe that I can change? If not, what must I do to find that faith?
What is my part in the process of being changed?
Am I willing to go to whatever lengths are necessary for recovery?
Which of my defects am I not willing to let go of? Why?
What must I do to become willing?
How does my awareness of my defects contribute to my readiness to have them removed?
Do I believe God will remove my defects? Why or why not?
What blocks my willingness to have these defects removed?
Do I believe that I can still enjoy life without my character defects? Why or why not?
Have I lost the fear that God may not come through for me?
What am I doing to increase my readiness?
How has humility helped me in developing readiness?
What are the benefits of being changed?
What am I willing to do to prepare myself for the Seventh Step?
